name: soup.exe
description:
Soup .............   ver 0.9

◇　あそびかた - How To Play: 

Click - Proceed
W A S D - Movement 
Arrow Keys - Look

_............. notes ..........._

Ported to WebGL by CruFro using Unity
Some artistic license was applied. Not entirely reflective of the original game. 

The original game, music, and assets by Yarhalla-

Developer Twitter: https://twitter.com/yarhalla


-------- additional information ---------
this game was re-created both as a cultural archive and to make the art of Soup more accessible. i found the experience of playing it to be highly compelling. maybe for its unique atmosphere and acute juxtapositions. it is not intended to be distributed with profitable intent. all excess profits will be redistributed within the tezos ecosystem & given to artists. 


Contact me on Discord for a free copy, or any inquiries > CruFro#3979
